item.title: What is Anomaly Detection?
item.description: How can your credit card issuer know if a purchase is made by you or a cloned version of your credit card?

item.description: Find out if the use of machine learning is essential in all business cases. Evaluate benefits and limitations.

item.title: Credit Score Classification App
item.description: Using Streamlit to make a web app that classifies your credit score using Python

item.title: Data Science Challenge - Churn Rate
item.description: Alura hosted a four-week Data Science Challenge using an imbalanced dataset of Churn Rate of a company Alura Voz
